1.Name: antimage_magebanes_mirror
1.Title: Magebane's Mirror
1.Desc: Spells countered by Counterspell will immediately burn a percentage of its mana cost from the enemy and deal damage based on the burned mana cost.

1.Name: antimage_mana_thirst
1.Title: Mana Thirst
1.Desc: Anti-Mage gains damage when his enemies are at low mana.

2.Name: axe_one_man_army
2.Title: One Man Army
2.Desc: Axe gains Strength based on his armor as long as he's away from his allies.

2.Name: axe_call_out
2.Title: Call Out
2.Desc: Berserker's Call gives attacking enemies more attack speed and Axe more armor for the duration.

3.Name: bane_dream_stalker
3.Title: Dream Stalker
3.Desc: Bane has increased attack speed when attacking Nightmared units.

3.Name: bane_sleepwalk
3.Title: Sleepwalk
3.Desc: Nightmared units walk in Bane's chosen direction.

4.Name: bloodseeker_arterial_spray
4.Title: Arterial Spray
4.Desc: Ruptured units are pushed when attacked by Bloodseeker.

4.Name: bloodseeker_old_blood
4.Title: Old Blood
4.Desc: Bloodrage silences the target and can be applied to enemies. Bloodrage increases base attack damage instead of spell damage.

5.Name: crystal_maiden_glacial_guard
5.Title: Glacial Guard
5.Desc: Crystal Nova has increased radius and grants allied heroes a physical damage barrier. Barrier is increased for Crystal Maiden.

5.Name: crystal_maiden_arcane_overflow
5.Title: Arcane Overflow
5.Desc: Activating Arcane Aura temporarily increases Crystal Maiden's spell amplification and mana costs. During the duration, Crystal Maiden restores her and her allies' Mana when casting spells.

6.Name: drow_ranger_high_ground
6.Title: Vantage Point
6.Desc: Drow deals 30% more damage when attacking from high ground.

6.Name: drow_ranger_sidestep
6.Title: Sidestep
6.Desc: Drow can move slowly and use items while casting Multishot.

7.Name: earthshaker_tectonic_buildup
7.Title: Tectonic Buildup
7.Desc: Aftershock radius is increased by {s:bonus_aftershock_range_increase_per_level_interval} for every level of Echo Slam.

7.Name: earthshaker_reverberating_ridge
7.Title: Resonating Ridge
7.Desc: Enemy heroes stunned by Fissure emit an echo to each nearby unit.

8.Name: juggernaut_bladestorm
8.Title: Bladestorm
8.Desc: Blade Fury can now critically strike based on the level of Blade Dance.

8.Name: juggernaut_agigain
8.Title: Bladeform
8.Desc: Juggernaut gains Agility and Movement Speed as long as he's not taking damage.

9.Name: mirana_starstruck
9.Title: Starstruck
9.Desc: Starstorm's second meteor deals more damage and blinds the target.

9.Name: mirana_leaps_and_bounds
9.Title: Leaps and Bounds
9.Desc: Upon landing, Leap roots targets in a {s:bonus_root_radius} radius for {s:bonus_root_duration}s.

10.Name: morphling_agi
10.Title: Ebb
10.Desc: Morphling's Primary Attribute is now <font color='#9acd32'>Agility</font>. Waveform attacks enemies in his path.

10.Name: morphling_str
10.Title: Flow
10.Desc: Morphling's Primary Attribute is now <font color='#ff0000'>Strength</font>. Morphling gains 1% Spell Amp per 4 Agility.

11.Name: nevermore_lasting_presence
11.Title: Lasting Presence
11.Desc: Presence of the Dark Lord temporarily reduces more armor after nearby enemy heroes are killed. Every hero kill increases Necromastery's max souls by {s:bonus_max_soul_increase_on_hero_kill} until Shadow Fiend dies.

12.Name: phantom_lancer_lancer
12.Title: Fractured
12.Desc: This facet doesn't do anything. Azwraith is out spear fishing...

13.Name: puck_jostling_rift
13.Title: Jostling Rift
13.Desc: Waning Rift can push or pull targets.

13.Name: puck_curveball
13.Title: Curveball
13.Desc: Puck's Illusory Orb can be curved in any direction, moves faster, deals more damage and lasts longer.

14.Name: pudge_fresh_meat
14.Title: Fresh Meat
14.Desc: Dismember increases Strength when dealing damage to heroes.

14.Name: pudge_rotten_core
14.Title: Rotten Core
14.Desc: While Rot is activated, Pudge gains bonus attack damage every second.

15.Name: razor_thunderhead
15.Title: Thunderhead
15.Desc: Storm Surge lightning strikes more often and hits all units within Eye of the Storm's area of effect when it is active.

15.Name: razor_spellamp
15.Title: Dynamo
15.Desc: Razor gains 1.25% spell amplification for every 20 points of attack damage.

16.Name: sand_king_obscurity
16.Title: Sandblast
16.Desc: When Sand King attacks enemies in Sand Storm, he applies a blinding debuff to his target.

16.Name: sand_king_pinpoint
16.Title: Final Sting
16.Desc: A Caustic Finale explosion is created around every enemy hero hit in Stinger's innermost radius.

17.Name: storm_spirit_shock_collar
17.Title: Shock Collar
17.Desc: Electric Vortex applies a debuff that triggers an Overload Charge if they attack.

17.Name: storm_spirit_static_slide
17.Title: Static Slide
17.Desc: Static Remnants spawn at Storm Spirit and move to the target position.

18.Name: sven_heavy_plate
18.Title: Heavy Plate
18.Desc: Warcry provides a physical damage barrier.

18.Name: sven_strscaling
18.Title: Wrath of God
18.Desc: Sven gains additional attack damage from Strength.

19.Name: tiny_crash_landing
19.Title: Crash Landing
19.Desc: Tossed units slow and deal bonus damage to other targets at the Toss destination.

19.Name: tiny_insurmountable
19.Title: Insurmountable
19.Desc: Tiny gains Status and Slow Resistance from Strength. Slow Resistance also reduces the impact of Attack Speed slows.

20.Name: vengefulspirit_avenging_missile
20.Title: Avenging Missile
20.Desc: Magic Missile deals {s:bonus_damage_per_lasthit} bonus damage for every creep the enemy has killed.

20.Name: vvengefulspirit_melee
20.Title: Soul Strike
20.Desc: Vengeful Spirit's ranged attacks behave as if they were melee attacks.

21.Name: windrunner_tangled
21.Title: Tangled
21.Desc: Shackleshot affects more enemies and grants damage per unit shackled.

21.Name: windrunner_killshot
21.Title: Killshot
21.Desc: Powershot executes low health enemy heroes.

22.Name: zuus_livewire
22.Title: Livewire
22.Desc: Static Field deals more damage to nearby enemies.

22.Name: zuus_divine_rampage
22.Title: Divine Rampage
22.Desc: When Thundergod's Wrath kills an enemy, it deals more damage to the other enemies.

23.Name: kunkka_high_tide
23.Title: High Tide
23.Desc: Tidebringer cooldown is reduced per enemy hero it hits.

23.Name: kunkka_grog
23.Title: Grog Blossom
23.Desc: When X Marks the Spot returns its target, Kunkka and all nearby allies gain Ghostship's Admiral's Rum buff.

25.Name: lina_supercharge
25.Title: Thermal Runaway
25.Desc: Casting Laguna Blade temporarily supercharges Lina, granting her stacks of Fiery Soul.

25.Name: lina_dot
25.Title: Slow Burn
25.Desc: Lina's spells deal extra damage over time.

26.Name: lion_essence_eater
26.Title: Essence Eater
26.Desc: Mana Drain deals damage equal to {s:bonus_damage_pct}% of mana stolen.

26.Name: lion_fist_of_death
26.Title: Fist of Death
26.Desc: Lion gains a strong Melee cleaving attack after casting Finger of Death.

27.Name: shadow_shaman_voodoo_hands
27.Title: Chicken Fingers
27.Desc: Shadow Shaman's attacks can transform enemies into a chicken.

27.Name: shadow_shaman_massive_serpent_ward
27.Title: Massive Serpent Ward
27.Desc: Summons a single massive Serpent Ward with {s:bonus_mega_ward_multiplier_damage}x damage and {s:bonus_mega_ward_multiplier_health}x health and bounty values.

28.Name: slardar_leg_day
28.Title: Leg Day
28.Desc: Slardar has slow resistance and even more movement speed at the beginning of Guardian Sprint.

28.Name: slardar_brineguard
28.Title: Brineguard
28.Desc: Corrosive Haze increases Slardar's armor by {s:bonus_armor_pct}% of the total armor reduced.

29.Name: tidehunter_kraken_swell
29.Title: Kraken Swell
29.Desc: Kraken Shell gains permanent Damage Block when an enemy hero dies under the effects of Anchor Smash.

29.Name: tidehunter_sizescale
29.Title: Krill Eater
29.Desc: Tidehunter grows larger and gains extra bonuses per level.

30.Name: witch_doctor_cleft_death
30.Title: Cleft Death
30.Desc: Death Ward attacks multiple targets with reduced damage.

31.Name: lich_growing_cold
31.Title: Growing Cold
31.Desc: When an enemy is killed by Chain Frost or while under the effect of Frost Shield, the duration of these abilities is extended.

31.Name: lich_cryophobia
31.Title: Evil Eye
31.Desc: Sinister Gaze applies a lingering effect to the target, causing it to take extra magic damage from Lich and amplify incoming movement slows.

32.Name: riki_riki
32.Title: Cutthroat
32.Desc: This facet doesn't do anything. Riki is still looking to avenge the House of Tahlin...

33.Name: enigma_gravity
33.Title: Event Horizon
33.Desc: Units in a 600 radius moving away from Enigma have a 8/12/16/20% movespeed penalty.

33.Name: enigma_fragment
33.Title: Splitting Image
33.Desc: Enigma spawns Eidolons upon receiving damage.

34.Name: tinker_repair_bots
34.Title: Repair Bots
34.Desc: March of the Machines applies a non-stacking heal over time when passing through allied heroes.

34.Name: tinker_translocator
34.Title: Translocator
34.Desc:
When a Self-Defense Matrix barrier on Tinker is fully absorbed, he blinks in a random forward direction.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

35.Name: sniper_ghillie_suit
35.Title: Ghillie Suit
35.Desc: While Take Aim is active, Sniper's attacks do not reveal him from fog of war.

35.Name: sniper_scattershot
35.Title: Scattershot
35.Desc: Shrapnel slow and damage are increased, but duration is decreased.

36.Name: necrolyte_profane_potency
36.Title: Profane Potency
36.Desc: Sadist also grants Necrophos' AoE abilities and items bonus Radius per kill.

36.Name: necrolyte_rapid_decay
36.Title: Rapid Decay
36.Desc: Ghost Shroud steals speed from his enemies and decreases their restorative powers.

37.Name: warlock_golem
37.Title: Champion of Gorroth
37.Desc: Chaotic Offering Golems deal more burn damage based on Warlock's health and mana regeneration.

37.Name: warlock_grimoire
37.Title: Black Grimoire
37.Desc: Grants Warlock the item Black Grimoire, which can be consumed to gain experience for each kill Warlock participated in. Starts with 1 charge.

38.Name: beastmaster_wild_hunt
38.Title: Wild Hunt
38.Desc: Beastmaster attacks faster when his units are nearby.

38.Name: beastmaster_beast_mode
38.Title: Beast Mode
38.Desc: Beastmaster can get a self attack speed and damage amplification boost.

39.Name: queenofpain_selfdmg
39.Title: Masochist
39.Desc: Queen of Pain has bonus Spell Amplification but a percentage of her spell damage is reflected back to her.

39.Name: queenofpain_facet_bondage
39.Title: Bondage
39.Desc: Queen of Pain returns spell damage back to enemies. Succubus's Spell Lifesteal also applies to Pure & Magical reflected damage.

40.Name: venomancer_plague_carrier
40.Title: Plague Carrier
40.Desc: When Venomous Gale impacts enemy heroes, {s:bonus_num_created_wards_tooltip} Plague Wards are created around them. Plague Wards also deal Septic Shock damage based on their attack damage.

41.Name: faceless_void_chronosphere
41.Title: Chronosphere
41.Desc: Faceless Void can cast Chronosphere, trapping enemies in a sphere.

41.Name: faceless_void_time_zone
41.Title: Time Zone
41.Desc: Faceless Void can cast Time Zone, dramatically slowing down enemies and speeding up allies in an area.

42.Name: skeleton_king_facet_bone_guard
42.Title: Bone Guard
42.Desc: Wraith King can summon skeletons to fight for him.

42.Name: skeleton_king_facet_cursed_blade
42.Title: Spectral Blade
42.Desc: Wraith King's attacks curse enemies, dealing additional damage after a delay.

43.Name: death_prophet_ghosts
43.Title: Spirit Collector
43.Desc: Hero deaths empower your next Exorcism.

43.Name: death_prophet_delayed_damage
43.Title: Mourning Ritual
43.Desc: Death Prophet delays a percentage of incoming damage, taking the damage in even intervals over a short duration.

44.Name: phantom_assassin_methodical
44.Title: Methodical
44.Desc: Coup de Grace procs every {s:bonus_attacks_to_proc} attacks on the same hero or {s:bonus_attacks_to_proc_creeps} attacks on non hero units.

44.Name: phantom_assassin_sweet_release
44.Title: Sweet Release
44.Desc: Stifling Dagger re-casts when an enemy dies.

45.Name: pugna_siphoning_ward
45.Title: Siphoning Ward
45.Desc: Nether Ward restores mana and health to Pugna based on how much damage is dealt.

45.Name: pugna_rewards_of_ruin
45.Title: Rewards of Ruin
45.Desc: Pugna receives {s:bonus_tower_scale}% spell amplification per destroyed tower.

46.Name: templar_assassin_voidblades
46.Title: Voidblades
46.Desc: Meld bonus damage and armor reductions are applied to all enemies in the Psi Blades split range.

46.Name: templar_assassin_refractor
46.Title: Refractor
46.Desc: Refraction gains a damage charge every time a shield charge gets consumed.

46.Name: templar_assassin_hidden_reach
46.Title: Hidden Reach
46.Desc: When in Meld, Templar increases her attack range by up to an additional {s:bonus_attack_range_increase_max} range over {s:bonus_attack_range_increase_time}s.

47.Name: viper_poison_burst
47.Title: Poison Burst
47.Desc: After Poison Attack stacks expire, enemies around the target take additional damage.

47.Name: viper_caustic_bath
47.Title: Caustic Bath
47.Desc: Viper's Corrosive Skin effects are increased while he is in Nethertoxin.

48.Name: luna_moonshield
48.Title: Moonshield
48.Desc: Lunar Orbit provide damage reduction while active.

48.Name: luna_moonstorm
48.Title: Moonstorm
48.Desc: Hitting enemies with Lucent Beams or Eclipse grants Luna bonus attack damage.

49.Name: dragon_knight_fire_dragon
49.Title: Fire Dragon
49.Desc: Dragon Knight deals additional Magic Damage with his attacks. Dragon Knight's abilities have increased Area of Effect that get stronger when in Elder Dragon Form.

49.Name: dragon_knight_corrosive_dragon
49.Title: Corrosive Dragon
49.Desc: Dragon Knight has Corrosive Powers on his attacks that get stronger when in Elder Dragon Form. All of his abilities deal Physical damage.

49.Name: dragon_knight_frost_dragon
49.Title: Frost Dragon
49.Desc: Dragon Knight has Slow and Health Restoration Reduction Effects on his attacks that get stronger when in Elder Dragon Form.

50.Name: dazzle_facet_nothl_boon
50.Title: Nothl Boon
50.Desc: Dazzle's overhealing is converted into a barrier. Weave is stronger on allies and amplifies incoming heals from Dazzle.

50.Name: dazzle_poison_bloom
50.Title: Poison Bloom
50.Desc: Dazzle can spread his Poison Touch when attacking enemies. Weave is stronger on enemies.

51.Name: rattletrap_hookup
51.Title: Hookup
51.Desc: If there's another allied hero within {s:bonus_radius_ally} of Hookshot's hit target, Clockwerk and all allies in the area receive bonus armor, while refunding a portion of Hookshot's cooldown and manacost.

51.Name: rattletrap_expanded_armature
51.Title: Expanded Armature
51.Desc: Power Cogs form in a larger radius.

51.Name: rattletrap_junk_mail
51.Title: Chainmeal
51.Desc: Clockwerk can consume Chainmails to permanently gain +{s:bonus_armor_per_chainmail} armor.

52.Name: leshrac_misanthropy
52.Title: Misanthropy
52.Desc: Diabolic Edict explosion rate increased but it no longer damages buildings.

53.Name: furion_soothing_saplings
53.Title: Soothing Saplings
53.Desc: After Sprout is cast, all trees in a {s:bonus_healing_radius} radius heal nearby allies.

53.Name: furion_natures_profit
53.Title: Nature's Profit
53.Desc: Whenever Nature's Prophet kills an enemy hero or one dies nearby, a money tree is created in their place that drops gold bags to be collected.

54.Name: life_stealer_fleshfeast
54.Title: Fleshfeast
54.Desc: Feast's max HP per hero kill is increased. Open Wounds' cooldown is refreshed if a unit dies while afflicted by Open Wounds.

54.Name: life_stealer_gorestorm
54.Title: Gorestorm
54.Desc: Consuming a creep with Infest drenches enemies in blood which deals damage over time based on the host's remaining health. Infest can be used on Ancient creeps.

55.Name: dark_seer_atkspd
55.Title: Quick Wit
55.Desc: Dark Seer also gains Attack Speed from Intelligence.

55.Name: dark_seer_movespd
55.Title: Heart of Battle
55.Desc: Dark Seer moves faster when near other heroes.

56.Name: clinkz_clinkz
56.Title: Trial By Pyre
56.Desc: This facet doesn't do anything. Clinkz is still burning with revenge...

57.Name: omniknight_omnipresent
57.Title: Omnipresent
57.Desc: Omniknight deals more damage to heroes inside his Degen Aura.

57.Name: omniknight_dmgheals
57.Title: Healing Hammer
57.Desc: Ability damage done to enemies by Omniknight heals him over time.

58.Name: enchantress_overprotective_wisps
58.Title: Overprotective Wisps
58.Desc: Summon Healing Wisps upon receiving damage.

58.Name: enchantress_spellbound
58.Title: Spellbound
58.Desc: Enchant and attacks on Enchanted targets have extra range.

59.Name: huskar_cauterize
59.Title: Cauterize
59.Desc: Berserker's Blood can be activated for a health cost. Dispels Huskar, then after a delay, heals for the amount of health consumed plus an additional bonus per debuff dispelled.

59.Name: huskar_nothl_conflagration
59.Title: Incendiary
59.Desc: Burning Spears also burns enemies for a percentage of their max health. Costs Max Health instead of Current Health.

60.Name: night_stalker_dayswap
60.Title: Night Reign
60.Desc: The game now starts at night instead of day. Night is longer than day. Night Stalker starts with a bonus level of Hunter in the Night.

60.Name: night_stalker_voidbringer
60.Title: Voidbringer
60.Desc: Increases the max level of Void. Level {s:bonus_max_level_tooltip} Void at night becomes ground targeted and applies to an area.

61.Name: broodmother_necrotic_webs
61.Title: Necrotic Webs
61.Desc: Reduces health restoration of enemies on webs.

61.Name: broodmother_feeding_frenzy
61.Title: Feeding Frenzy
61.Desc: Insatiable Hunger also applies to nearby Spiderlings.

62.Name: bounty_hunter_shuriken
62.Title: Through and Through
62.Desc: Shuriken Toss applies its damage and slow to all enemies it passes through.

62.Name: bounty_hunter_mugging
62.Title: Cutpurse
62.Desc: Bounty Hunter steals gold when targeting enemy heroes with his abilities or items.

63.Name: weaver_skitterstep
63.Title: Skitterstep
63.Desc: Shukuchi movespeed increased and slows enemies when passing through them.

63.Name: weaver_hivemind
63.Title: Hivemind
63.Desc: Weaver gains experience when The Swarm beetles attack heroes.

64.Name: jakiro_twin_terror
64.Title: Twin Terror
64.Desc: Jakiro deals more damage with his double attacks.

64.Name: jakiro_ice_breaker
64.Title: Ice Breaker
64.Desc: Ice Path lasts longer and detonates upon expiration, dealing damage and stunning enemies a second time. Ice Path can be manually detonated early.

65.Name: batrider_buff_on_displacement
65.Title: Stoked
65.Desc: Firefly also lights Batrider on fire. He gains increasingly more Move Speed and Spell Amplification and burns away a portion of his max health each second.

65.Name: batrider_arsonist
65.Title: Arsonist
65.Desc: Increases the max level of Sticky Napalm. Level {s:bonus_max_level_tooltip} Sticky Napalm causes every attack to apply {s:bonus_napalm_stacks_on_attack_tooltip} stack of Sticky Napalm.

66.Name: chen_centaur_convert
66.Title: Centaur Convert
66.Desc: Summon Convert calls forth either a Centaur Courser or Centaur Conqueror.

66.Name: chen_hellbear_convert
66.Title: Hellbear Convert
66.Desc: Summon Convert calls forth either a Hellbear or Hellbear Smasher.

66.Name: chen_troll_convert
66.Title: Troll Convert
66.Desc: Summon Convert calls forth either a Hill Troll or Dark Troll Summoner.

66.Name: chen_satyr_convert
66.Title: Satyr Convert
66.Desc: Summon Convert calls forth either a Satyr Mindstealer or Satyr Tormenter.

66.Name: chen_frog_convert
66.Title: Marshmage Convert
66.Desc: Summon Convert calls forth either a Marshmage Apprentice or a Marshmage.

67.Name: spectre_spectre
67.Title: Ephemeral
67.Desc: This facet doesn't do anything. Spectre is still transcending between Planes...

68.Name: ancient_apparition_bone_chill
68.Title: Bone Chill
68.Desc: Ancient Apparition's abilities reduce the enemy's Strength.

68.Name: ancient_apparition_exposure
68.Title: Exposure
68.Desc: Cold Feet applies in an AoE, depending on the current level of Ice Blast.

69.Name: doom_bringer_gluttony
69.Title: Gluttony
69.Desc: Devour now has {s:bonus_AbilityCharges} charges and stolen creep abilities are upgraded by one level.

69.Name: doom_bringer_impending_doom
69.Title: Impending Doom
69.Desc: Every {s:bonus_upgrade_interval} minutes, Doom's duration is increased by {s:bonus_upgrade_amount}s.

70.Name: ursa_grudge_bearer
70.Title: Grudge Bearer
70.Desc: When damaged during Enrage, Ursa gains bonus attack damage.

70.Name: ursa_debuff_reduce
70.Title: Bear Down
70.Desc: Debuffs inflicted by Ursa last longer.

71.Name: spirit_breaker_bull_rush
71.Title: Bull Rush
71.Desc: Charge of Darkness bonus movement speed lingers after charge ends.

71.Name: spirit_breaker_bulls_hit
71.Title: Bull's Hit
71.Desc: Greater Bash chance is increased if you've bashed more than one hero recently.

72.Name: gyrocopter_secondary_strikes
72.Title: Secondary Strikes
72.Desc: Call Down creates delayed secondary explosions around heroes it hits.

72.Name: gyrocopter_afterburner
72.Title: Afterburner
72.Desc: Every successful hit of a Rocket Barrage rocket on an enemy hero increases Gyrocopter's movement speed.

73.Name: alchemist_mixologist
73.Title: Mixologist
73.Desc: Unstable Concoction and Berserk Potion recharge faster when in Chemical Rage.

73.Name: alchemist_dividends
73.Title: Dividends
73.Desc: Alchemist gains +{s:bonus_gpm_increase_per_stack} GPM for each Aghanim's Scepter he has granted to allies.

74.Name: invoker_quas_focus
74.Title: Scholar of Koryx
74.Desc:
Quas gains an additional max level. When Invoker reaches level 6, Quas gains an additional level.

Aghanim's Scepter upgrades Ice Wall.

Aghanim's Shard upgrades Ghost Walk.

74.Name: invoker_wex_focus
74.Title: Mind of Tornarus
74.Desc:
Wex gains an additional max level. When Invoker reaches level 6, Wex gains an additional level.

Aghanim's Scepter upgrades Tornado.

Aghanim's Shard upgrades E.M.P.

74.Name: invoker_exort_focus
74.Title: Agent of Gallaron
74.Desc:
Exort gains an additional max level. When Invoker reaches level 6, Exort gains an additional level.

Aghanim's Scepter upgrades Sun Strike.

Aghanim's Shard upgrades Sun Strike.

75.Name: silencer_spread_the_knowledge
75.Title: Synaptic Split
75.Desc: Increases the max level of Glaives of Wisdom. Level {s:bonus_max_level_tooltip} Glaives of Wisdom bounce {s:bonus_bounce_count_tooltip} time to a random target within {s:bonus_bounce_range_tooltip} range.

75.Name: silencer_oppressive_silence
75.Title: Suffer In Silence
75.Desc: Silencer takes less damage from and deals more damage to silenced targets.

76.Name: obsidian_destroyer_obsidian_decimator
76.Title: Obsidian Decimator
76.Desc: When Essence Flux restores mana, it also temporarily increases maximum mana.

76.Name: obsidian_destroyer_overwhelming_devourer
76.Title: Overwhelming Devourer
76.Desc: Heroes affected by Astral Imprisonment and Sanity's Eclipse heal Outworld Destroyer every time they cast a spell.

77.Name: lycan_pack_leader
77.Title: Pack Leader
77.Desc: Enemy heroes killed by Lycan or his units extend Shapeshift duration.

77.Name: lycan_spirit_wolves
77.Title: Spirit Wolves
77.Desc: Summon Wolves creates invulnerable non-attacking wolves that buff Lycan's health and attack damage.

77.Name: lycan_alpha_wolves
77.Title: Alpha Wolves
77.Desc: Increases the max level of Summon Wolves while lowering the max level of Howl and Feral Impulse.

78.Name: brewmaster_brewmaster
78.Title: Hungover
78.Desc: This facet doesn't do anything. Brewmaster is still recovering from a drunken stupor...

79.Name: shadow_demon_promulgate
79.Title: Promulgate
79.Desc: Disseminate instantly removes a percentage of the opponent's health for its duration.

79.Name: shadow_demon_facet_soul_mastery
79.Title: Shadow Servant
79.Desc: Shadow Demon creates illusions of heroes that die near him.

80.Name: lone_druid_lone_druid
80.Title: Forbearance
80.Desc: This facet doesn't do anything. Lone Druid is still attuning to nature...

81.Name: chaos_knight_irrationality
81.Title: Irrationality
81.Desc: Reality Rift has equal chances of applying Break, Disarm, or Silence for {s:bonus_additional_debuff_duration_percent}% of the base debuff duration in addition to its normal effects.

81.Name: chaos_knight_facet_fundamental_forging
81.Title: Fundamental Forging
81.Desc: Chaos Knight can craft artifacts from the next tier when making a Neutral Item.

81.Name: chaos_knight_cloven_chaos
81.Title: Cloven Chaos
81.Desc: Chaos Bolt splits in half upon striking its target, stunning one additional enemy and damaging another.

82.Name: meepo_more_meepo
82.Title: More Meepo
82.Desc: Obtain extra Meepos sooner and get 1 extra Meepo.

82.Name: meepo_codependent
82.Title: Codependent
82.Desc: Meepos increase other Meepos' attack speed and armor.

83.Name: treant_treant
83.Title: Uprooted
83.Desc: This facet doesn't do anything. Treant Protector is still finding his roots...

84.Name: ogre_magi_fat_chance
84.Title: Fat Chance
84.Desc: Each point of Ogre Magi's Strength adds {s:bonus_strength_mult}% to Ogre Magi's Multicast chance.

84.Name: ogre_magi_learning_curve
84.Title: Learning Curve
84.Desc: Level requirement of all spells and talents reduced by {s:bonus_required_level_reduction}. You get {s:bonus_level_one_ability_points} Ability Points at level one and {s:bonus_level_two_ability_points} Ability Points at level two.

85.Name: undying_rotting_mitts
85.Title: Rotting Mitts
85.Desc: While transformed into a Flesh Golem, attacks spawn a zombie.

85.Name: undying_ripped
85.Title: Ripped
85.Desc: Casting Soul Rip on allies increases their Strength by a percentage of Undying's Strength.

86.Name: rubick_frugal_filch
86.Title: Frugal Filch
86.Desc: Stolen spells also have lower mana cost.

86.Name: rubick_arcane_accumulation
86.Title: Arcane Accumulation
86.Desc: Casting a spell temporarily increases the area of effect for all subsequent spells.

87.Name: disruptor_thunderstorm
87.Title: Thunderstorm
87.Desc: Thunder Strike additionally hits all enemies within Kinetic Field. Thunder Strike Slow duration is increased.

87.Name: disruptor_line_walls
87.Title: Kinetic Fence
87.Desc: Replaces Kinetic Field with the ability to create impassable walls.

87.Name: disruptor_conduit
87.Title: Transference
87.Desc: Electromagnetic Repulsion can be activated manually, be cast on allies and deals damage equal to a percentage of Disruptor's current health.

88.Name: nyx_assassin_burn_mana
88.Title: Mana Burn
88.Desc: Mind Flare burns a percentage of the target's max mana.

88.Name: nyx_assassin_scuttle
88.Title: Scuttle
88.Desc: For the first {s:bonus_free_pathing_duration}s of Vendetta, Nyx Assassin is hasted and has unobstructed pathing.

89.Name: naga_siren_passive_riptide
89.Title: Rip Tide
89.Desc: Every 6 attacks from Naga and her illusions, enemies around them are damaged and their Armor is reduced.

89.Name: naga_siren_active_riptide
89.Title: Deluge
89.Desc: Naga Siren can create a splash around herself and her illusions, damaging enemies and capping their max movement speed.

90.Name: keeper_of_the_light_facet_solar_bind
90.Desc: Grants the Solar Bind ability while active.

91.Name: wisp_kritzkrieg
91.Title: Kritzkrieg
91.Desc: Overcharge grants attack speed and spell amplification to Io and any Tethered allies.

91.Name: wisp_medigun
91.Title: Medigun
91.Desc: Overcharge grants armor and magic resistance to Io and any Tethered allies.

92.Name: visage_sepulchre
92.Title: Sepulchre
92.Desc: Grave Chill also affects units around the target. Visage can also recall his familiars.

92.Name: visage_faithful_followers
92.Title: Faithful Followers
92.Desc: Familiars automatically move with Visage and attack his targets.

92.Name: visage_gold_assumption
92.Title: Death Toll
92.Desc: Soul Assumption kills give bonus gold. Visage can also recall his familiars.

93.Name: slark_slark
93.Title: Fugitive
93.Desc: This facet doesn't do anything. Slark is still reeling from nightmares about Dark Reef...

94.Name: medusa_engorged
94.Title: Engorged
94.Desc: Mystic Snake grants Medusa attack damage.

94.Name: medusa_slow_attacks
94.Title: Venomous Volley
94.Desc: Every 6 attacks, Medusa applies poison to her arrow that briefly reduces movement speed and attack speed.

94.Name: medusa_undulation
94.Title: Undulation
94.Desc: Medusa's movement speed is fixed at 310 (465 during Stone Gaze). Medusa is unslowable and does not benefit from movement speed increases.

95.Name: troll_warlord_insensitive
95.Title: Insensitive
95.Desc: Fervor grants armor per stack while in melee form.

95.Name: troll_warlord_bad_influence
95.Title: Bad Influence
95.Desc: During Battle Trance, Troll Warlord has increased max Fervor stacks and no attack speed limit. Battle Trance grants allied heroes {s:bonus_attack_speed_share_percent}% of the attack speed bonus.

96.Name: centaur_counter_strike
96.Title: Counter-Strike
96.Desc: Double Edge damage is increased when Centaur is damage by enemies.

96.Name: centaur_horsepower
96.Title: Horsepower
96.Desc: Centaur Warrunner gains Movement Speed based on his Strength.

97.Name: magnataur_eternal_empowerment
97.Title: Eternal Empowerment
97.Desc: Empower is always on Magnus. Each subsequent attack increases its power.

97.Name: magnataur_diminishing_return
97.Title: Diminishing Return
97.Desc: Increases the max level of Shockwave. Level {s:bonus_max_level_tooltip} Shockwave causes it to return towards Magnus's location.

98.Name: shredder_shredder
98.Title: Shredder
98.Desc: Timber Chain splinters the tree into all directions around Timbersaw.

99.Name: bristleback_snot_rocket
99.Title: Snot Rocket
99.Desc: Bristleback now fires Viscous Nasal Goo instead of Quills when damaged. Viscous Nasal Goo effects are stronger.

99.Name: bristleback_seeing_red
99.Title: Seeing Red
99.Desc: Warpath can be activated to gain extra bonuses. While Seeing Red, Bristleback's vision is limited and he does not receive vision from his allies.

100.Name: tusk_facet_tag_team
100.Title: Tag Team
100.Desc: Tusk can cast Tag Team causing nearby enemies to receive bonus damage from attacks.

100.Name: tusk_facet_fist_bump
100.Title: Drinking Buddies
100.Desc: Tusk can cast Drinking Buddies, pulling him and a teammate closer and granting both bonus Movement Speed and Attack Damage.

101.Name: skywrath_mage_shield
101.Title: Shield of the Scion
101.Desc: Skywrath Mage gains a magic damage barrier when dealing damage to heroes.

101.Name: skywrath_mage_staff
101.Title: Staff of the Scion
101.Desc: Skywrath Mage's Cooldowns are reduced when he deals spell damage to enemy heroes.

102.Name: abaddon_death_dude
102.Title: The Quickening
102.Desc: Units dying nearby Abaddon lower his cooldowns.

102.Name: abaddon_mists_of_fate
102.Title: Malignant Mist
102.Desc: Mist Coil also deals {s:bonus_damage_percentage_on_perform_attack}% attack damage and applies effects from items and abilities. Self Damage increased when targeting enemies.

103.Name: elder_titan_deconstruction
103.Title: Deconstruction
103.Desc: Natural Order drains Magic Resistance and Armor over time.

103.Name: elder_titan_boost_atkspd
103.Title: Momentum
103.Desc: Elder Titan's Base Attack Speed is reduced but his Movement Speed also grants Attack Speed.

104.Name: legion_commander_stonehall_plate
104.Title: Stonehall Plate
104.Desc: Overwhelming Odds grants an all damage barrier based on the damage it deals to enemy heroes.

104.Name: legion_commander_spoils_of_war
104.Title: Spoils of War
104.Desc: When a Duel is won, units that damaged the loser during the Duel will gain permanent bonus damage. If Legion Commander won the Duel, she will automatically cast Press the Attack on herself and assisting allies.

105.Name: techies_atk_range
105.Title: Squee's Scope
105.Desc: Techies gains 1 attack range and attack projectile speed for each point of attack speed.

105.Name: techies_spleens_secret_sauce
105.Title: Spleen's Secret Sauce
105.Desc: Increased Blast Off! damage and self damage.

105.Name: techies_backpack
105.Title: Spoon's Stash
105.Desc: Techies stack all previously selected Enchantments onto newly crafted Neutral Items.

106.Name: ember_spirit_double_impact
106.Title: Double Impact
106.Desc: Sleight of Fist hits one of its targets an extra time.

106.Name: ember_spirit_chain_gang
106.Title: Chain Gang
106.Desc: Searing Chains can affect two additional enemies. When Searing Chains are cast, they are also cast around each Fire Remnant.

107.Name: earth_spirit_earth_spirit
107.Title: Reformation
107.Desc: This facet doesn't do anything. Earth Spirit is still not fully grounded...

108.Name: abyssal_underlord_demons_reach
108.Title: Demon's Reach
108.Desc: Underlord's attacks cleave while he has bonus damage from Atrophy Aura.

109.Name: terrorblade_condemned
109.Title: Condemned
109.Desc: There is no minimum health threshold for Sundered enemies.

109.Name: terrorblade_soul_fragment
109.Title: Soul Fragment
109.Desc: Conjure Image illusions always spawn at full health and cost health instead of mana.

110.Name: phoenix_facet_immolate
110.Title: Dying Light
110.Desc: Phoenix deals 4.5% of his missing health as magic damage to all enemies in a 400 radius every second.

110.Name: phoenix_hotspot
110.Title: Hotspot
110.Desc: Sun Ray deals more damage and applies more Blinding Sun stacks towards the tip of the ray.

111.Name: oracle_facet_dmg
111.Title: Clairvoyant Curse
111.Desc: Spell amplification increased by 1% per hero level.

111.Name: oracle_facet_heal
111.Title: Clairvoyant Cure
111.Desc: Heal amplification increased by 0.75% per hero level.

112.Name: winter_wyvern_winterproof
112.Title: Winterproof
112.Desc: Cold Embrace can be cast on buildings. Does not heal buildings. Allied units and buildings gain bonus attack damage when emerging from the icy cocoon.

112.Name: winter_wyvern_recursive
112.Title: Recursive
112.Desc: Winter's Curse is recast on the lowest health enemy hero if the primary target dies.

113.Name: arc_warden_runed_replica
113.Title: Runed Replica
113.Desc:
The Tempest Double is infused with the bonuses of Power Runes for {s:bonus_rune_duration}s when created.

Level 1 - Arcane Rune.

Level 2 - Arcane and Invisibility Runes.

Level 3 - Arcane, Invisibility, and Haste Runes.

113.Name: arc_warden_power_capture
113.Title: Power Capture
113.Desc: Magnetic Field pulls runes. Arc Warden gains +{s:bonus_all_attribute_bonus_per_stack} all attributes permanently upon activating a Power Rune.

114.Name: monkey_king_simian_stride
114.Title: Simian Stride
114.Desc: Increases the max level of Tree Dance. Level {s:bonus_max_level_tooltip} Tree Dance reduces the cooldown to zero.

114.Name: monkey_king_transfiguration
114.Title: Changing of the Guard
114.Desc: Monkey King can transform into one of his soldiers during Wukong's command.

119.Name: dark_willow_throwing_shade
119.Title: Throwing Shade
119.Desc: Dark Willow deals more damage to nearby heroes when she's in the Shadow Realm.

119.Name: dark_willow_shattering_crown
119.Title: Shattering Crown
119.Desc: Cursed Crown accumulates all damage dealt by Dark Willow and attack damage dealt by her allies. A percentage of that damage is dealt again as magical damage to the whole area when the counter expires.

120.Name: pangolier_pangolier
120.Title: Dangerous Liaisons
120.Desc: This facet doesn't do anything. Pangolier is still recovering from a heroic exploit...

121.Name: grimstroke_inkstigate
121.Title: Inkstigate
121.Desc: Ink Swell can be manually detonated early.

121.Name: grimstroke_fine_art
121.Title: Fine Art
121.Desc: Stroke of Fate additionally launches a reflected curved stroke from the right hand.

123.Name: hoodwink_hunter
123.Title: Go Nuts
123.Desc: Scurry also provides bonus attack and cast range.

123.Name: hoodwink_hipshot
123.Title: Hipshot
123.Desc: Sharpshooter has a greatly reduced cooldown. Damage, debuff duration, turn time, and wind-up times are also reduced.

126.Name: void_spirit_sanctuary
126.Title: Sanctuary
126.Desc: Resonant Pulse creates a larger all damage barrier instead of a physical barrier.

126.Name: void_spirit_aether_artifice
126.Title: Call of the Void
126.Desc: Upon exiting Dissimilate, Aether Remnants are created at the {s:bonus_aether_remnant_count} portals furthest from Void Spirit.

128.Name: snapfire_ricochet_ii
128.Title: Ricochet II
128.Desc: Whenever Snapfire glances or misses an attack, 2 ricochet attacks will bounce towards nearby enemies.

128.Name: snapfire_full_bore
128.Title: Full Bore
128.Desc: Scatterblast is narrower and longer. Bonus damage and slow when enemies are not in point blank range.

129.Name: mars_victory_feast
129.Title: Victory Feast
129.Desc: Mars and his allies gain health, mana, and attack damage when an enemy inside his Arena of Blood dies.

129.Name: mars_arena
129.Title: Blood Sport
129.Desc: Enemies inside the Arena of Blood don't have vision outside the arena.

131.Name: ringmaster_carny_classics
131.Title: Carny Classics
131.Desc: Ringmaster's Souvenirs are Funhouse Mirror, Strongman Tonic, and Whoopee Cushion.

131.Name: ringmaster_sideshow_secrets
131.Title: Sideshow Secrets
131.Desc: Ringmaster's Souvenirs are Crystal Ball, Unicycle, and Weighted Pie.

135.Name: dawnbreaker_solar_charged
135.Title: Solar Charged
135.Desc: Whenever Dawnbreaker hits a target with a powered up Luminosity, she decreases the cooldowns of all of her abilities.

135.Name: dawnbreaker_blaze
135.Title: Starsurge
135.Desc: Dawnbreaker and nearby allies gain bonus attack speed at the end of Starbreaker for each swipe that hit enemy heroes.

135.Name: dawnbreaker_hearthfire
135.Title: Trailblazer
135.Desc: Walking along Celestial Hammer's fire trail gives bonus movespeed.

136.Name: marci_buddy_system
136.Title: Buddy System
136.Desc: While bodyguarded, Marci and her partner share a portion of health healed by this ability with each other.

136.Name: marci_pickmeup
136.Title: Pick-me-up
136.Desc: Rebound can be alt-cast to bring Marci's ally with her after the jump.

137.Name: primal_beast_provoke_the_beast
137.Title: Provoke the Beast
137.Desc: Gain {s:bonus_stack_count_increase_on_disable} Uproar stacks upon being disabled by an enemy hero.

137.Name: primal_beast_ferocity
137.Title: Ferocity
137.Desc: Each Pulverize slam increase Primal Beast's AoE.

138.Name: muerta_dance_of_the_dead
138.Title: Dance of the Dead
138.Desc: The Calling becomes stronger when heroes die inside it.

138.Name: muerta_slingshot
138.Title: Quickdraw
138.Desc:
Dead Shot fears increase Gunslinger chance.

Gunslinger procs reduce Dead Shot cooldown.

145.Name: kez_flutter
145.Title: Flutter
145.Desc: Kez deals extra damage on the first attack after switching to Katana, and gains bonus movement speed after switching to Sai.

145.Name: kez_shadowhawk
145.Title: Shadowhawk
145.Desc: Triggering a Shodo Sai Mark from invisibility deals bonus critical damage. Increases Raven's Veil invisibility duration.

155.Name: largo_largo
155.Title: Musical pilgrimage
155.Desc: This facet doesn't do anything. Largo just arrived from the island of Velu'Mar...
